summary: No new characters or connections in this chapter.
summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (3 ties).
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (3), Alyona Ivanovna (2), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (1), Porfiry Petrovich (1)
story_summary: Raskolnikov confronts Alyona Ivanovna at her home, pretending to sell her a silver cigarette case. As she becomes suspicious, he suddenly attacks her with an axe, killing her. Afterward, he searches her belongings for valuables, feeling a mix of fear and horror over his actions. In a panic, he washes the blood from his hands and the axe.
